name: Rlunde.GitHub.io
body:
# Ron Lunde
I'm a software developer in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

I've been working as a software engineer / software architect since 1983, and have used git at work for years, but I'm just now (*finally!*) getting started with github.

I thought I'd start by creating a few very simple open source projects, just to get familiar with everything.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
